title: Lab-AI: Using Retrieval Augmentation to Enhance Language Models for Personalized Lab Test Interpretation in Clinical Medicine
details: X Wang, H Ouyang, B Bhasuran, X Luo, K Hanna…
abstract: Accurate interpretation of lab results is crucial in clinical medicine, yet most patient portals use universal normal ranges, ignoring conditional factors like age and gender. This study introduces Lab-AI, an interactive system that offers personalized …

title: Palliative Care Engagement in Intensive Care Units: A Retrospective Analysis of Electronic Health Record Data

abstract: Rationale: There is support for engaging palliative care services in the intensive care unit (ICUs). However, our understanding of the current role of palliative care consultation in the ICU is limited. Methods: We performed a retrospective analysis of …
